meanings.definition: The quality or state of being related to the sense of hearing.
meanings.sent1: The auralities of the music filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the auralities of the birds chirping in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The auralities of the loud snoring coming from the cat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The auralities of the bustling city were like a symphony of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The auralities of the thunderstorm were both frightening and mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Sounds or noises that are heard.
meanings.sent1: The auralities of the traffic outside were constant and loud.
meanings.sent2: He could not sleep due to the auralities of the howling wind.
meanings.sent3: The auralities of the squeaky door made it seem like it was talking.
meanings.sent4: The auralities of the distant train were a reminder of far-off places.
meanings.sent5: The auralities of the chirping crickets created a peaceful nighttime symphony.
